name: Cardiac Assault (Ludum Dare 39)
description:
EPILEPSY WARNING - Flashing lights

Wager your life by galvanising your heart, putting it under insane risk of rupturing forth under the stress, all for the power the unleash wild current to tear your enemies apart, eviscerating them with whipping lashes of rending lightning.

HOW TO PLAY

Click when your heart beats to shoot out lightning and generate current. The higher your current, the stronger you become. Touching the enemies evaporates them at the cost of draining your energy significantly.

Heart runs out of current, it’ll kill you. Heart gets too much current, it’ll kill you. In fact, you’ll have to work Very Hard to stay alive.

.
